lrisbr/

lrisbr_anl_spectra.pro


top lrisbr_anl_spectra

lrisbr_anl_spectra, lab, mask, slitrange=slitrange, aprange=aprange, nobcor=nobcor, showplot=showplot

NAME: LRISBR_ANL_SPECTRA PURPOSE: Wrapper script for analyzing fitted LRIS spectra. EXPLANATION: CALLING SEQUENCE lrisbr_anl_spectra,mask,slitrange=,aprange=,/dobcor,/showplot INPUTS: mask - String name of mask, as specified in LRIS_INITFIT_SPECTRA slitrange - scalar or two-element array specifying range of slits to fit aprange - scalar or two-element array specifying range of apertures to fit nobcor - do not correct blue line fluxes based on Balmer lines showplot - display to screen each fit as it is plotted INPUT: A binary (.genx) file containing the results of the fit. OUTPUT: JPG plots of stellar, emission-line, and continuum fits, and data files summarizing outputs. METHOD: REVISION HISTORY: 09may13 David Rupke created 09jun07 David Rupke added multiple components

Parameters

lab
mask

Keywords

slitrange
aprange
nobcor
showplot
